channel.description: Recent content in Google on Compile My Mind

item.title: Google Gemini 3: A Leap Forward in Multimodal Reasoning and Developer Tooling
item.description: The AI arms race is accelerating, and Google is stepping up with Gemini 3 â€” a new multimodal model designed to reason, code, and generate interactive outputs at a new level. In this post I summarize what Google announced, how the new capabilities differ from previous releases, and what developers and everyday users should expect from Gemini 3, Gemini 3 Pro, Gemini Agent, Gemini 3 Deep Think, and Antigravity.
